mapper.select: select mq.movieqNo, ms.movieqId, ms.score FROM movieq as mq left join movies as ms on mq.movieqNo = ms.movieqNo and ms.movieqId = #{movieqId}
select count(score) from movies where movieqNo=#{movieqNo} and movieqId=#{movieqId}
